title: Cybersecurity Game-Based Microlearning: Defense Strategy Training Using the iMonsters Board Game

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of network fundamentals, types of malware, and security protocols
context.additional_context: Modular learning design for pre-service/in-service teachers to experience cybersecurity trends via game mechanics, accessible through mobile devices.

learning_goals: Perform simulations by applying at least three defense strategies in game scenarios modeled after real cyberattack cases.
Identify and explain response procedures for at least five latest security vulnerabilities through ontology-based game updates.
Evaluate collaborative problem-solving skills in team-based gameplay and incorporate peer feedback.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
